Question
========
What is the recommended way to execute R code for a real project in Positron?

Answerlist
----------
* Run individual lines in random order from the console
* Keep code in the console history without saving it
* Save the script and run the whole file via `Source R File` (or `source()`)
* Only rerun the few lines you most recently edited

Solution
========
For reproducible work you should save your script and execute the entire file with `Source R File` (or `source("path/to/script.R")`), not just scattered lines.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
